title: Unable to use any hot keys or use any spells whenever I join a game
body:
Luckily I checked for this in a custom (I _was _ going to join a ranked game) I need help. I've already sent in a ticket. 
:(

replies.body:
This may be easily resolved with an input settings reset. Sometimes these files become corrupted and stop working entirely. Following are a set of steps to complete this:

>First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom match**. *Alt+Tab* out of League, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:
**- input.ini**
**- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, leave the match, then hop into another one to confirm that the reset went through properly. Let me know if you have any questions.

Oh no! D: 

Was it on the same account? If so, do you have any programs running in the background that assign macros to hotkeys, such as Razer Synapse or Logitech Gaming Software?
Haha buddy. Nothing specific I mean...I notice that whenever it happens, I'm always alt+tabbed in load screen. So does this mean I can't alt tab :( ?

*Alt+Tabbing* in the loading screen has a history of being problematic, especially if it's done before the champion portraits show up. The common workaround to this is to run League in Borderless Mode instead of Full Screen under your **VIDEO** settings in-game.

Let me know if this helped.
It did however, are there any drawbacks of borderless mode?
Not really. On lower-power PC's, it will add a bit more stress to the system that may be noticeable, but on higher power computers, it's not an issue. :)
Thank you sir. You've been the most helpful Rioter that I've ever encountered. :) Have an amazing day.

Thank you buddy. Have a great day.
